remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何為主控描繪功能表項目具有的功能表。The following code example demonstrates a menu with an owner-drawn menu item. 這個範例會使用`AddHandler`陳述式和`AddressOf`運算子來指定要處理的委派事件。This example uses the `AddHandler` statement and the `AddressOf` operator to designate a delegate to handle the event. 若要執行的範例位置將它貼入的形式，匯入 System、 System.Windows.Forms 和 System.Drawing 命名空間。To run the example place paste it in a form that imports the System, System.Windows.Forms, and System.Drawing namespaces. 確定所有事件與事件處理方法相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods.
